评论详情: I was really surprised at the quality and fit. The color was exactly as pictured and the fabric was so soft. I loved it!  It also laundered well.

Love the material of this shirt, feels so nice.  It's super versatile, works for a casual day or a night out.  The fit is spot on, I ordered my usual size and it's perfect.  Definitely recommend grabbing one of these.  So glad I bought it!

I have received compliments on this top. The material is not too thick but keeps me warm. I also wear a tshirt under on colder days. The color is beautiful, it’s also washed well. I did hang up to dry. The sleeves are a tad too short than what I would like.
Love this sweatshirt.  Really pretty, well made, great price.  Wish there were more colors.
Nice fabric, comfortable,good design. But not sweatshirt material
I was very suspicious of this as it was not your normal sweatshirt material.  However, it was warm and comfortable.

Bought this for myself in a size up from my regular size and the larger was appropriately 'baggy' without looking goofy. Lightweight yet still cozy. Could get away wearing for a business casual dress code with the right pants and shoes. I honestly really like this top and will likely buy another in a different color in the future

I am not sure about the material it’s soft yet polyester. The fit is a little boxy but I have big hips so it sits nice. I like the color comes off a little more tan than brown. Washed it and it’s held up nicely. Add a dark brown to your collection and I will buy it! Wearing xl

I wanted a lightweight, long black sweatshirt for exercise class.  This one is perfect for my needs----lightweight & long enough to cover my t-shirt, but not too long to get in the way.  Lots of colors & the price was right!
Material feels good, very soft, and just warm enough without being too much. Definitely buying in a few more colors!

评论概述: Wonderful sweatshirts for cooler weather - super cozy!
评论详情: I love this sweatshirt (I actually have 2)! They are very comfortable, cozy and easy to wash/dry. I also love the quarter-zip neckline because I can zip it all the way if it's really cold or zip it down a bit for a more air. I want more colors!!!
I got these on sale for a great price, ordered in four different colors. Great fabric, not too heavy, not too light. Perfect for fall and spring.
I bought a large to have a nice oversized fit, this is cozy and comfortable.
I love this sweater! It’s thin but textured so has a good shape to it, the zipper doesn’t rub at my neck. It’s also 35%cotton and feels more natural

I love, love this top.  It is so comfortable and just the right weight  for running errands andBeing out and about.  I couldn’t resist so I ordered another one, but in a different color.Some tops just seem to hit the spot, and this one does!
Both fabric and construction are good.  Recommended
Size perfect great for price.
Very comfortable, has gone through the laundry well, still looks great. It's a good material for cooler days.

评论概述: Color was not what I expected!
评论详情: Fits too loose for a small body… the color was more of a light yellowish tint… Im returning. Thank you
It’s roomy but fits like a dream.  My new favorite
This is a very cute sweater Fits as sized
The shirt is cute and I like the length and I’m 5.8 but it’s a thin material and if you like the zipper down you can’t because you will see the inner part.

It’s super thin and see through. I washed it once and it shrunk the arms are too short and it fits like a crop top now. Not the most comfortable shirt ever it’s a rough feeling fabric. The zipper is a rough cheap metal that keeps getting stuck or it won’t zip up. Not worth your money.

Shirt was WADDED UP AND SHOVED IN A BAG!! Obviously, a returned item. POOR QUALITY, the band on the bottom is tight. I had a hard time getting it over my shoulders and I have very narrow shoulders! The pink is a very ugly dirty looking pink. Will not purchase from this seller again. First purchase, last purchase!
I loved this, if you want a baggy fit I would size up. If you're a mommy and want to hide the mommyy pooch, size up! Its warm and stretchy

评论概述: Fits true to size; is thinner than a regular sweatshirt; machine washable.
评论详情: This 65% Polyester and 35% Cotton sweatshirt has a collar with a quarter zipper, long sleeves with elasticized cuffs, a loosely fitted top section, and a banded, straight-cut hemline.  The fit is true to size.  The material is not as thick as a regular sweatshirt.  This is good for those people who run on the warmer side.  It is loose enough that one could wear another shirt underneath it.  The sleeves are a bit long.  I had to roll up the cuff so it would fit my arms.  The hemline isn’t tight across one’s body.  It falls past my hip and crotch area.  Overall, it is a decent sweatshirt.  It wouldn’t be on my Top Ten list.  Upon arrival, there were no loose seams or hanging threads when I inspected it.The sweatshirt is way too casual to wear to church or an office-type environment.  It would be perfect for a luncheon with friends, walking the dog, going out at the mall, going to a movie, or simply hanging around the house with your friends and family.  It can be paired with jeans, yoga pants, leggings, sweatpants, or shorts.  Don’t forget your shoes when completing your ensemble:  sandals, sneakers, or even Crocs.To maintain the quality of this sweatshirt, hand or machine wash in cold water.  Dry on a low setting.  Ironing on a low setting is fine.This sweatshirt is just okay for me.  It is made well enough, and the material is on the thinner side so you won’t overheat.  I would recommend it if you want something simple to wear.
I was hoping the material would be a little softer after I washed it but it wasn't. Still looks nice on

评论概述: Fits well, but fabric is a little meh
评论详情: The fit of this sweatshirt is great - an XXL gave me a great oversize fit (I typically wear a M). I appreciated that the waist band of the sweatshirt isn't tight, so it really does give a good oversize effect. However, the fabric isn't terribly soft and it's going to show stains really easily in the Grey-Blue color - it already is showing a little wear. Overall, fine.

Very comfy but much thinner quality than the photos. I was expecting a thick hoodie style fabric but its more like t-shirt material, still very cute but not like the photos. The color was spot on and the sizing was accurate.
I am just 5 foot tall so this sweatshirt works well for a oversized top.  It only slightly shrank when I washed it.  It will work well for fall when I need something that is not too heavy.
I would say this is true to size and even a little heavier then I would have thought which is nice for colder fall nights.

评论概述: Good Lightweight Sweatshirt, True to Size
评论详情: True to size (albeit, with a looser fit), but a good length and very comfortable, although the fabric is a little thinner than it looks in the photos on the product page. The zipper is not going to win any awards as being the finest zipper ever made, but it is fully functional. And the quarter zip pullover look is fashionable. The poly/cotton blend is quite comfy and stylish, especially in black. The whole thing looks great and is of good quality. It’s just a level below the premium quality you might expect at this price.

评论概述: Lightweight Pullover in a Gorgeous Color!
评论详情: Good quality, light weight material.  I do wish it was a little softer material, this is kind of a heavy tshirt-type.  The color though!!  The dark pink is more of a dusty lavender, so it's true to the photos shown.  I don't have anything in this color, so I was very excited when it showed up.  The sleeves may be a little short on anyone with long arms, but it fit well enough on me.  Large is my typical size and it was a little baggy, but I'd recommend going up one size if you like them very baggy.  The color is what really has me sold on this though!

Thr material is thick, soft, and comfortable. Color is pretty, fit is flattering and it does fit true to size. No problems running through the washer, but I did hang mine to dry to be on the safe side. I like the length of this sweatshirt, too.

I actually like the color which is mostly gray with a purple tint, not a typical gray.  I would say it fits true to size. I ordered a size up because so many of the clothes on Amazon run small and I wanted this to be a comfy sweatshirt but it's too big so I should have ordered my normal size! it is definitely comfortable and soft though!

This hot pink 3/4 zipper sweatshirt is very soft and comfortable. It is well-made. It’s supposed to be loose fit, but it isn’t really loose. It fits like normal. After washing and drying it, the color stayed perfect and did not fade at all. This is a very nice quality sweatshirt and the zipper is sewn in nicely and meets perfectly at the top as it should. I would definitely get this again and recommend it.

评论概述: Not as thick as I thought
评论详情: Thin material
This is perfect for fall to layer and wear in my classroom as the weather changes.  Lightweight so it won’t become uncomfortable. Very cute and good quality.
This is a lovely, lightweight, well-made sweatshirt. However, my wife's long torso made it a little short.

评论概述: Sorry, but this is not a "loose" fit "sweatshirt".
评论详情: The material of this "sweatshirt" is mostly polyester, so it doesn't have the feel of a typical sweatshirt. It's soft enough, but calling it a sweatshirt is misleading, in my opinion. It's also not loose fit. If I had followed the chart they provide this probably would have been tight on me. I always order up in sizes on sweatshirts because I like them loose. This fits like I had ordered my size or even possibly a size down from what I typically wear. Also, the band around the waist is kind of tight for a "loose" fit. Everything about the description is misleading. I feel like I should give it one star, but the material is soft enough, the style of the sweatshirt is fine, and it's something I can use, so I opted for a three star rating instead. But, be aware that if you want it to be loose to order up and this does not have your typical sweatshirt feel.
Super thin can see through the material. Maybe order a darker color. I’m not crazy about this shirt.
Great fit!
Fit true to size! I rarely buy Amazon clothes and I was impressed with this quality!

I purchased this pullover after an influencer promoted it and I was disappointed. It’s thinner than I expected, there’s no thumb holes, and it wasn’t as oversized as I thought. I exchanged for the next size up- which didn’t make a big difference oddly, but I’m going to keep it because it was under $15.
I bought this to wear over my scrubs at work! It fits great, definitely comfortable and I love it! Just the right thickness, and easy to get on and off! The zipper works great and it washes well!

It's always risky buying clothes on-line because you can't try them on or inspect the material, but I really scored points with this pullover.  It fit my wife perfectly and she loved the color scheme and how soft the material was.  It didn't seem to shrink-up or fade after it was washed.  My risk paid off and she loves it!

Based on the bust size in the measurement chart (44) a medium should have fit me. I normally wear an extra large so that's what I got. I don't think I would have wanted to size down any. It's definitely a looser style, no definition in the waist and a straight cut across the bottom. It's not sweatshirt material,  it's lightweight, but perfect for fall. Surprisingly, because I'm short, it didn't fall as long on me as the model in the ad, so I don't know that I would be as comfortable wearing it with my yoga pants, but it's definitely comfortable and well made. For reference, my waist is 36 inches and my hips are 44 inches.

This sweatshirt is perfect for those chilly fall days. The loose fit is comfortable and relaxed, and the quarter-zip design lets you adjust the amount of ventilation. The fabric is lightweight, so it's not too bulky or heavy. I love the versatility of these sweatshirts - I can dress them up with jeans or leggings, or wear them with sweatpants for a more casual look. They're perfect for running errands, lounging at home, or just hanging out with friends.

I really like this oversized zip pullover.  It's very roomy and comfortable.  The material is very soft and it's a waffle weave.  I ordered a large and it's very roomy.  I'm looking forward to wearing this fall with cooler temps!

评论概述: Comfortable and stylish quarter zip pullover
评论详情: The OFEEFAN quarter zip pullover is a fantastic choice for fall. The loose fit provides a relaxed and comfortable feel, while the lightweight fabric makes it perfect for layering. The quarter zip design adds a modern touch and allows for adjustable ventilation. It’s well-made and holds its shape well, making it a practical yet stylish addition to any fall wardrobe. The color options are versatile, and the pullover pairs easily with jeans or leggings. Overall, it’s a cozy and fashionable piece that delivers both comfort and style. Highly recommended!

I was really excited about this quarter zip sweatshirt but the pictures were very misleading and made it look much thicker and heavier than it actually is. The description says that it is lightweight but the pictures look like a regular weight sweatshirt. This quarter zip is actually really thin and feels more like a lightweight longsleeve shirt than anything else. I don't think it would look that great layered over something else because of how thin it is. The sleeves are also really large and long, so if you want something a little more fitted then you should size down. It is still a nice piece of clothing and I love all of the color options but it isn't what I was expecting.

It's still August but I've already worn this twice.  It is beyond cozy and comfortable.  It's perfect for the fall or an evening by the campfire.  I was initially worried it might look frumpy.  I normally wear a 16 and this fit fine.  It doesn't have an ounce of 'frump' to it!  It's also well made.  Great buy!

The material of this is more like a lightweight sweater than a sweatshirt in spite of the styling. It isn’t too oversized. I usually order mediums in sweatshirts as I like them a little bigger and this fits as I would have expected. The apricot color is a nice pale pink/peach and will be quite versatile. It washes nicely and is quite comfortable. I will be wearing this a lot this fall!
This is a very nice shirt. It fits as it should and it washed nicely too.

评论概述: Adorable and soft. Fits true to size
评论详情: Such great quality!P fabric is soft zipper works amazing! Really happy with this sweatshirt. Quality is fantastic. It does not shrink after first use fits true to size.

Really pleased with this loose fit sweatshirt. It's very comfy and soft and the fabric feels like very good quality. No loose threads or seams. Survived the washer and dryer just fine. Fits as expected and I just love it. Can't wait for the weather to turn cooler so I can wear it! :)

PROS: Made of lightweight 65%Polyester 35%Cotton fabric. It has a zipper that pulls smoothly. The color is like a dusty lavender. It’s more like a heavy t-shirt instead of a sweatshirt.  CONS: The length is shorter than the photos of the models. It hits me at the top of my hips and I was hoping for booty coverage.  Overall I love the color of this shirt. However, I feel as though this shirt is over priced.
The white zipper looks nice in picture, however the actual zipper is a metal silver zipper.  Not as nice looking as the picture shows
